author: Kohl, Johann Georg.
snippet: Not far from Drummond Castle is the little village of MuthilLAs my reverend friend resided in this neighbourhood, I deter-mined to remain here for the night, and found, in a little inn, everyrequisite comfort,—an agreeable, communicative, old hostess, acomfortable cleanly room, a bed half an acre in size, as is gene-rally the case in England, and milk, whisky, porridge, warmbrose,—in short, everything of the best that one can wish for inScotland.
